Hey GoodFilms.  What happened with the quality of 28 days later?  That was so not like you.  I don't mean to be bitchy but could you please post good quality version?  It happens to be my favorite zombie movie.

 Thanks and always appreciate your work.
READ THE DESCRIPTION on 28 Days Later. It looks how it does FOR A REASON. It can't look any better.
and the best way of contacting me really isn't by commenting on someone else's torrent. you can comment on my most recent torrent or at suprbay or at hexagon.

Thanks for another great upload.

There isn't an English language version available for some time, as GoodFims knows full well.
Yes, I do know that. So I will go see it at the cinema in a few weeks.

GoodFilms:  Let's just continue our discussion here.  Well I read the description and you are right:  28 Days Later was supposed to be that way.  

Anyways,how come so many negative ratings for your uploads lately?  Holly some movies are like over -60.  I personally think your movies are fine.  This is a result of your shitty attitude maybe?  

Oh well. cheer up.

I don't have a shitty attitude.

I am actually a very cheery person.

The negative votes are all from one person who I have a thing with. If someone genuinely doesn't like the quality of something, they say it in a COMMENT.

Have a nice day.
Thank you so much for uploading this, I'm dying to see this!!!
